types.description: Mark 15 numbers to bet in lotofácil. Win by hitting 11, 12, 13, 14 or 15 numbers.
Mark 6 out of the 60 available numbers. Win by hitting 6, 5 or 4 numbers.
Mark as many numbers as you want up to a maximum of 50. Win by hitting 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20 or none of the 20 numbers drawn.
